text: Kanta-Häme is a region in Finland. Kanta-Häme has many features that are similar to the Finnish Lakelands. Neighbouring regions are Uusimaa, Päijänne Tavastia, Pirkanmaa and Southwest Finland. ==Nature== Torronsuo National Park and Liesjärvi National Park are both located in Kanta-Häme, near Tammela. ==Municipalities== Cities marked bold: *Forssa *Hattula *Hausjärvi *Humppila *Hämeenlinna *Janakkala *Jokioinen *Loppi *Riihimäki *Tammela *Ypäjä ==Population growth== http://pxweb2.stat.fi/Dialog/varval.asp?ma=060_vaerak_tau_107&ti;=V%E4est%F6+kielen+mukaan+sek%E4+ulkomaan+kansalaisten+m%E4%E4r%E4+ja+maa%2Dpinta%2Dala+alueittain+1980+%2D+2012&path;=../Database/StatFin/vrm/vaerak/⟨=3&multilang;=fi Tilastokeskus reference, Finnish ==Traditional food== * Lammin sahti * Mämmi ==References== ==Other websites== *Hämeen liitto Category:Kanta-Häme
title: Kanta-Häme
